alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 12:49PM CDT until July 02 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CLAY AND NORTH CENTRAL DUNKLIN COUNTIES... At 1248 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near McDougal, or near Corning, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1236 PM nickel-size hail was reported in Corning Arkansas. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Piggott, Corning, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, St. Francis, Pollard, Greenway, McDougal, Saint Francis, Crockett, Carryville, Hickoria, Rhyne, Wilhelmina and Chalk Bluff Battlefield Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
